jihvā liṃgāt maṃtra śukram karṇa yonau niṣicya vai
jātaḥ putraḥ maṃtra putraḥ pitaram pūjayet gurum
nimajjayati putram vaisaṃsāre janakaḥ pitā
saṃtārayati saṃsārāt guruḥ vaibodhakaḥ pitā
ubhayoḥ aṃtaram jñātvā pitaram gurum arcayet
aṃga śuśrūṣayā acā api dhana ādyaiḥ sva arjitaiḥ gurum
pāda ādi keśa paryaṃtam liṃgāni aṃgāni yat guroḥ
dhana rūpaiḥ pādukā ādyaiḥ
snāna abhiṣeka naivedyaiḥ bhojanaiḥ ca prapūjayet
guru pūjā eva pūjā āsyāt śivasya paramātmanaḥ
guru śeṣam tu yat sarvam ātma śuddhi karam bhavet
guroḥ śeṣaḥ śiva ucchiṣṭam jalam anna ādi nirmitam
śiṣyāṇām śiva bhaktānām grāhyam bhojyam bhavet dvijāḥ
guru anujñā virahitam cora vat sakalam bhavet
guroḥ api viśeṣa jñam yatnāt gṛhṇīta vai gurum
ajñāna mocanam sādhyam viśeṣa jñaḥ hi mocakaḥ
ādau ca vighna śamanam kartavyam karma pūrtaye
nirvighnena kṛtam sa aṃgam karma vaisa phalam bhavet
tasmāt sakala karma ādau vighneśam pūjayet budhaḥ
sarva bādhā nivṛtti artham sarvān devān yajet budhaḥ
jvara ādi graṃthi rogāḥ ca bādhā hi ādhyātmika āma tā
piśāca jaṃbuka ādīnām valmīka ādi udbhave tathā
akasmāt eva godhā ādi jaṃtūnām patane pi ca
gṛhe kacchapa sarpa strī durjana adarśane pica
vṛkṣa nārī gavā ādīnām prasūti viṣaye pi ca
bhāvi duḥkham samāyāti tasmāt te bhautika āmatā
amedhyā śanipātaḥ ca mahāmārī tathā eva ca
jvaramārī viṣūciḥ ca gomārī ca masūrikā
janma ṛkṣa graha saṃkrāṃti graha yoga a svarāśike
duḥsvapna darśana ādyāḥ camatā vaihi adhidaivikāḥ
śava cāṃḍāla patita sparśa ādye antargṛhe gate
etādṛśe samutpanna bhāvi duḥkhasya sūcake
śāṃti yajñaṃ tu matimān kuryāt tad doṣa śāṃtaye
devālaye
prādeśa unnata dhiṣṇye vaidvihasteyasu alaṃkṛte
bhāra mātra vrīhi dhānyam prasthāpya parisṛtya ca
madhye vilikhya kamalam tathā dikṣu vilikhya vai
taṃtunā āveṣṭitam kuṃbham nava guggula dhūpitam
madhye sthāpya mahākuṃbham tathā dikṣu api vinyaset
sa nāla āmraka kūrca ādīn kalaśān ca tathā aṣṭasu
pūrayet maṃtra pūtena pañca dravya yutena hi
prakṣipet navaratnāni nīla ādīn kramaśas tathā
karma jñam ca sa patnīkam ācāryam varayet budhaḥ
suvarṇa pratimām viṣṇoḥ indra ādīnām ca nikṣipet
sa śiraske madhya kuṃbhe viṣṇum ā bāhya pūjayet
prāc ādiṣu yathāmaṃtram iṃdra ādīn kramaśas yajet
tad tad nāmnā caturthyām ca namaḥ nte na yathākramam
āvāhana ādikam sarvam ācāryeṇa eva kārayet
ācāryaḥ ṛtvijā sārdham tad mātrān prajapet śatam
kuṃbhasya paścime bhāge japa ante homam ācaret
koṭim lakṣam sahasram vā śatam aṣṭa uttaram budhāḥ
eka aham vā anavāham vā tathā maṃḍalam eva vā
yathāyogyam prakurvīta kāla deśa anusārataḥ
śamī homaḥ ca śāṃti arthe vṛtti arthe capalāśakam
samidh anna ājyakaiḥ dravyaiḥ nāmnā a maṃtreṇa vā hunet
prāraṃbhe yat kṛtam dravyam tad kriyā aṃtam samācaret
puṇyāham vācayitvā aṃte dine saṃprokṣya yet jalaiḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt yāvat āhuti saṃkhyayā
ācāryaḥ ca haviṣya āśītvijaḥ ca bhavet budhāḥ
āditya ādīn grahān iṣṭvā sarva homa ante eva hi
ṛtvibhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dadyāt navaratnam yathā kramam
daśa dānam tatas kuryāt bhūri dānam tatas param
bālānām upanītānām gṛhiṇām vaninām dhanam
kanyānām ca sabhartḥṇām vidhavānām tatas param
taṃtra upakaraṇam sarvam ācāryāya nivedayet
utpātānām ca mārīṇām duḥkha svāmī yamaḥ smṛtaḥ
tasmāt yamasya prīti artham kāladānam pradāpayet

original: śataniṣkeṇa vā kuryāddaśaniṣkeṇa vā punaḥ // ŚivP_1,18.124ab/
analyzed: śata niṣkeṇa vā kuryāt daśa niṣkeṇa vā punar
pāśa aṃkuśa dharam kālam kuryāt puruṣa rūpiṇam
tad svarṇa pratimā ādānam kuryāt dakṣiṇayā saha
tila dānam tatas kuryāt pūrṇa āyuṣya prasiddhaye
ājya avekṣaṇa dānam cakuryāt vyādhi nivṛttaye
sahasram bhojayet viprān daridraḥ śatam eva vā
vitta abhāve daridraḥ tu yathāśakti samācaret
bhairavasya mahā pūjām kuryāt bhūta ādi śāṃtaye
mahā abhiṣekam naivedyam śivasya ante tu kārayet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt bhūri bhojana rūpataḥ
evam kṛtena yajñena doṣa śāṃtim avāpnuyāt
śāṃti yajñam imam kuryāt varṣe varṣe tu phālgune
durdarśana ādau sadyas vai
mahā pāpa ādi saṃprāptau kuryāt bhairava pūjanam
mahā vyādhi samutpattau saṃkalpam punar ācaret
sarva bhāve daridraḥ tu dīpa dānam atha ācaret
tat api aśaktaḥ snātvā avaiyat kiṃcid dānam ācaret
divākaram namaskuryāt mantreṇa aṣṭa uttaram śatam
sahasram ayutam lakṣam koṭim vā kārayet budhaḥ
namaskāra ātma yajñena tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarva devatāḥ
tvad sva rūpa īrpita abuddhiḥ nate śūnye ca rocati
yā ca asti asmad ahaṃtā iti tvayi dṛṣṭe vivarjitā
namraḥ haṃ hi sva dehe nabhaḥ mahān tvam asi prabho
smi sāṃpratam
yathāyogyam sva ātma yajñam namaskāram prakalpayet
atha atra śiva naivedyam dattvā tāṃbūlam āharet
śiva pradakṣiṇam kuryāt svayam aṣṭa uttaram śatam
sahasram ayutam lakṣam koṭim anyena kārayet
śiva pradakṣiṇāt sarvam pātakam naśyati kṣaṇāt
duḥkhasya mūlam vyādhiḥ hi vyādheḥ mūlam hi pātakam
dharmeṇa eva hi pāpānām apanodanam īritam
śiva uddeśa kṛtaḥ dharmaḥ kṣamaḥ pāpa vinodane
adhyakṣam śiva dharmeṣu pradakṣiṇam iti īritam
kriyayā japa rūpam hi praṇavam tu pradakṣiṇam
jananam maraṇam dvaṃdvam māyā cakram iti īritam
śivasya māyā cakram hi balipīṭham tat ucyate
bali pīṭham samārabhya prādakṣiṇya krameṇa vai
pade pada antaraṃga tvā bali pīṭham samāviśet
namaskāram tatas kuryāt pradakṣiṇam iti īritam
nirgamāt jananam prāptam namaḥ tu ātmasamarpaṇam
jananam maraṇam dvaṃdvam śivam āyā samarpitam
śiva māyā arpita dvaṃdvaḥ na punar tu ātma bhāj bhavet
yāvat dehaṃkriyā adhīnaḥ sa jīvaḥ baddhaḥ ucyate
deha traya vaśīkāre mokṣaḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ
śiva māyā arpita dvaṃdvam śiva stu parimārjati
śivena kalpitam dvaṃdvam tasmin eva samarpayet
śivasya ati priyam vidyāt pradakṣiṇam namaḥ budhāḥ
pradakṣiṇa namaskārāḥ śivasya paramātmanaḥ
ṣoḍaśaiḥ upacāraiḥ ca kṛta pūjā phala pradā
pradakṣiṇā vināśyam hi pātakam na asti bhū tale
tasmāt pradakṣiṇena eva sarva pāpam vināśayet
śiva pūjā paraḥ maunī satya ādi guṇa saṃyutaḥ
kriyā tapaḥ japa jñāna dhyāneṣu ekaikam ācaret
aiśvaryam divya dehaḥ ca jñānam ajñāna saṃśayaḥ
śiva sānnidhyam iti ete kriyā ādīnām phalam bhavet
karaṇena phalam yāti tamasaḥ parihāpanāt
janmanaḥ parimārji tvāt jña buddhyā janitāni ca
yathādeśam yathākālam yathādeham yathādhanam
yathāyogyam prakurvīta kriyā ādīn śiva bhaktimān
nyāya arjita su vittena vaset prājñaḥ śivasthale
jīva hiṃsā ādi rahitam ati kleśa vivarjitam
pañcākṣareṇa japtam ca toyam annam viduḥ sukham
athavā huḥ daridrasya bhikṣā annam jñāna dam bhavet
śiva bhaktasya bhikṣā annam śiva bhakti vivardhanam
śaṃbhu satram iti prāhuḥ bhikṣā annam śiva yoginaḥ
yena kena api upāyena yatra kutra api bhū tale
śuddha anna bhuj sadā maunī rahasyam na prakāśayet
prakāśayet tu bhaktānām śiva māhātmyam eva hi
rahasyam śiva maṃtrasya śivaḥ jānāti nā aparaḥ
śiva bhaktaḥ vaset nityam śiva liṃgam samāśritaḥ
sthāṇu liṃga āśrayeṇa eva sthāṇuḥ bhavati bhūsurāḥ
pūjayā cara liṃgasya kramāt muktaḥ bhavet dhruvam
sarvam uktam samāsena sādhya sādhanam uttamam
vyāsena yat purā proktam yat śrutam hi mayā purā
smākam śiva bhaktiḥ dṛḍhā

analyzed: vṛthā bhavati sā pūjā snāna dāna ādikam vṛthā
pārthiva ārādhanam puṇyam dhanyam āyuḥ vivardhanam
tuṣṭi dam puṣṭi dam śrīdam kāryam sādhaka sattamaiḥ

atha vaidika bhaktānām pārthiva arcām nigadyate

tasya darśana mātreṇa brahmahatyā vyapohati
yatra saṃpūjitaḥ tatra lakṣmīḥ dūratarā na hi
naśyaṃti upadravāḥ sarve sarva kāmāḥ bhavaṃti hi
viśeṣataḥ sa rudrākṣaḥ go vadham nāśayet drutam
sākṣāt sādhana daḥ sadā
tad prabhāvāt bhaveyuḥ vaividyāḥ sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
caturvaktraḥ svayam brahmā anarahatyām vyapohati
darśanāt sparśanāt sadyas caturvarga phala pradaḥ
pañcavaktraḥ svayam rudraḥ kālāgniḥ nāmataḥ prabhuḥ
sarva mukti pradaḥ ca eva sarva kāma phala pradaḥ
agamyā gamanam pāpam abhakṣyasya ca bhakṣaṇam
ityādi sarva pāpāni
ṣaḍvaktraḥ kārtikeyaḥ tu dhāraṇāt dakṣiṇe bhuje
brahmahatyā ādikaiḥ pāpaiḥ mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
saptavaktraḥ maheśāni hi anaṃgaḥ nāma nāmataḥ
dhāraṇāt tasya deva īśi daridraḥ upi īśvaraḥ bhavet
rudrākṣaḥ ca aṣṭavaktraḥ ca vasumūrtiḥ ca bhairavaḥ
dhāraṇāt tasya pūrṇa āyuḥ mṛtaḥ bhavati śūlabhṛt
bhairavaḥ navavaktraḥ ca kapilaḥ ca muniḥ smṛtaḥ
tam dhārayet vāma haste rudrākṣam bhakti tatparaḥ
sarveśvaraḥ bhavet nūnam mama tulyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: daśavaktro maheśāni svayaṃ devo janārdanaḥ // ŚivP_1,25.76ab/
analyzed: daśavaktraḥ maheśāni svayam devaḥ janārdanaḥ  /
dhāraṇāt tasya deveśi sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
ekādaśa mukhaḥ yaḥ tu rudrākṣaḥ parameśvari
sa rudraḥ dhāraṇāt tasya sarvatra vijayībhavet
dvādaśa āsyam tu rudrākṣam dhārayet keśa deśake
ādityāḥ ca eva te sarve dvādaśa eva sthitāḥ tathā
trayodaśa mukhaḥ viśvedevaḥ tad dhāraṇāt naraḥ
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti saubhāgyam maṃgalam labhet

original: caturdaśamukho yo hi rudrākṣaḥ paramaḥśivaḥ // ŚivP_1,25.80ab/
analyzed: caturdaśa mukhaḥ yaḥ hi rudrākṣaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ
dhārayet mūrdhni tam bhaktyā sarva pāpam praṇaśyati
iti rudrākṣa bhedāḥ hi proktāḥ avaimukha bhedataḥ
tad tad maṃtrān śṛṇu prītyā kramāt śailleśvara ātmaje

original: aṃ hrīnamaḥ 1 aṃnamaḥ 2 aṃklīṃnamaḥ 3 aṃhrīṃnamaḥ 4 aṃhrīṃnamaḥ 5 aṃhrīṃ huṃ namaḥ
analyzed: aṃ hrī namaḥ aṃ namaḥ aṃ klīṃ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ hum namaḥ

original: 6 aṃhuṃnamaḥ 7 aṃhuṃnamaḥ 8 aṃhrīṃhuṃnamaḥ 9 aṃhrīṃnamaḥ namaḥ 10 aṃhrīṃhuṃnamaḥ
analyzed: aṃhuṃ namaḥ aṃhuṃ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ huṃ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ namaḥ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ huṃ namaḥ

original: 11 aṃkroṃ kṣauṃ rauṃ namaḥ 12 aṃhrīṃnamaḥ 13 aṃnama 14
analyzed: aṃ kroṃ kṣauṃ rauṃ namaḥ aṃ hrīṃ namaḥ aṃ nama
bhakti śraddhā yutaḥ ca eva sarva kāma artha siddhaye
rudrākṣān dhārayet maṃtraiḥ devanālasya varjitaḥ

original: vinā maṃtreṇa ho dhatte rudrākṣaṃ bhuvimānavaḥ // ŚivP_1,25.83ab/
analyzed: vinā maṃtreṇa ho dhatte rudrākṣam bhuvi mānavaḥ

original: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvadindrāścaturdaśa // ŚivP_1,25.83cd/
analyzed: sa yāti narakam ghoram yāvat indrāḥ caturdaśa
rudra akṣa mālinam dṛṣṭvā bhūta preta piśācakāḥ

original: ḍākinīśākinī caiva ye cānye drohakārakāḥ // ŚivP_1,25.84cd/
analyzed: ḍākinī śākinī ca eva ye ca anye droha kārakāḥ
kṛtrimam ca eva yat kiṃcid abhicāra ādikam cayāt
tat sarvam dūra toya ati dṛṣṭvā śaṃkita vigraham

original: rudrākṣamālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā śivo viṣṇuḥ prasīdati // ŚivP_1,25.86ab/
analyzed: rudrākṣa mālinam dṛṣṭvā śivaḥ viṣṇuḥ prasīdati
devī gaṇapatiḥ sūryaḥ surāḥ ca anye pi pārvati
evam jñātvā tu māhātmyam rudrākṣasya maheśvari
samyak dhāryāḥ sa maṃtrāḥ ca bhaktyā adharma vivṛddhaye
iti uktam girija agre hi śivena paramātmanā
śivasya ati priyau jñeyau bhasma rudra akṣa dhāriṇau
tad dhāraṇa prabhāvat hi bhuktiḥ muktiḥ na saṃśayaḥ
bhasma rudrākṣa dhārī yaḥ śiva bhaktaḥ saḥ ucyate
pañcākṣara japa āsaktaḥ paripūrṇaḥ ca sat mukhe
vinā bhasma tripuṃḍreṇa vinā rudrākṣa mālayā
pūjitaḥ api mahādevaḥ na abhīṣṭa phala dāyakaḥ
tat sarvam ca samākhyātam yat pṛṣṭam hi muni īśvara
etat yaḥ śṛṇuyāt nityam māhātmya paramam śubham
rudra akṣa bhasmanoḥ bhaktyā sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt
iha sarva sukham bhuktvā putra pautra ādi saṃyutaḥ
labhet paratra sat mokṣam śivasya ati priyaḥ bhavet
vidyeśvara saṃhitā iyam kathitā vaḥ muni īśvarāḥ
sarva siddhi pradā nityaṃmukti dā śiva śāsanāt

original: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe prathamāyāṃ vidyeśvarasaṃhitāyāṃ sādhyasādhanakhaṇḍe rudrākṣamahātmyavarṇanonāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī śiva mahāpurāṇe prathamāyām vidyeśvara saṃhitāyām sādhyasādhana khaṇḍe rudrākṣamahātmyavarṇanā nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
